original_title: Father kills son, daughter in Ampara
original_body_lines: Ampara, March 14 (Daily Mirror)- A father has hacked to death his 29 year-old son and a 14 year-old girl in the Periyaneelavanai area in Ampara this morning.
The father had attempted to commit suicide by slitting his neck with a sharp weapon which he had used to kill his son and daughter.
He was admitted in a critical condition to the Kalmunai Hospital.
